fields.name: Stiegl Goldbräu
fields.description: A full-bodied Austrian lager with a golden hue and well-balanced malt flavors.

fields.name: Gösser Märzen
fields.description: A traditional Märzen with a smooth malt taste and a slightly sweet finish.

fields.name: Ottakringer Helles
fields.description: A refreshing Helles beer with mild bitterness and a clean malt character.

fields.name: Trumer Pils
fields.description: A crisp and refreshing pilsner with delicate hop bitterness and a clean finish.

fields.name: Zipfer Urtyp
fields.description: A balanced pale lager with subtle hop bitterness and a malty backbone.

fields.name: Eggenberg Samichlaus
fields.description: A rich and strong doppelbock with notes of caramel, chocolate, and dark fruit.

fields.name: Schladminger Bio Zwickl
fields.description: An unfiltered organic Zwickl beer with a cloudy appearance and refreshing taste.

fields.name: Murauer Märzen
fields.description: A classic Märzen beer with a smooth malt flavor and a hint of sweetness.

fields.name: Hirter Privat Pils
fields.description: A premium pilsner with a pronounced hop aroma and a dry, crisp finish.
